strapiEvent.name: Carving in the Ozarks 18th Annual Festival
strapiEvent.description:
Get ready for an awesome weekend because once again, the hills of the Ozarks will be alive with the sound of CHAINSAWS!


Carving in the Ozarks is just around the corner and you won't want to miss it! Come and witness some of the most incredible artistry and craftsmanship from talented carvers from around the country!


It's truly an experience you won't forget! So mark your calendars and get ready for an unforgettable weekend!


APRIL 21-22ND

Carving starts at 8am daily

Auction on Saturday at 4pm
